trigger.expression: {Oracle SingleInstance Template:alive.last(#1)}<>1 and {Oracle SingleInstance Template:alive.last(#2)}<>1 and {Oracle SingleInstance Template:alive.last(#3)}<>1
trigger.name: [ORA001]-{HOST.NAME}：数据库无法访问
[ORA002]-{HOST.NAME}：无法从orabbix获取数据库信息
trigger.description: No data retrieved from Orabbix for database

trigger.expression: {Oracle SingleInstance Template:hitratio_table_proc.avg(60)}<30 or {Oracle SingleInstance Template:hitratio_trigger.avg(60)}<30 or {Oracle SingleInstance Template:hitratio_sqlarea.avg(60)}<30 or {Oracle SingleInstance Template:hitratio_body.avg(60)}<30
trigger.name: [ORA005]-{HOST.NAME}：Library cache命中率低
